title: Rule
text: There shall be allowed as a credit against the tax imposed by this subtitle for the taxable year an amount equal to the sum of the amounts payable to the taxpayer——under section6420(determined without regard to section6420(g)),—under section6421(determined without regard to section6421(i)), and—under section6427(determined without regard to section6427(k)).

logical_structure.result: There shall be allowed as a credit against the tax imposed by this subtitle for the taxable year an amount equal to the sum of the amounts payable to the taxpayer——under section6420(determined without regard to section6420(g)),—under section6421(determined without regard to section6421(i)), and—under section6427(determined without regard to section6427(k)).

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 34(a)General Rule—There  shall be allowed as a credit against the tax imposed by this subtitle for 
                  the taxable year an amount equal to the sum of the amounts payable to the  taxpayer—I.R.C. § 34(a)(1)—under  section6420(determined without regard to section6420(g)),I.R.C. § 34(a)(2)—under  section6421(determined without regard to section6421(i)), andI.R.C. § 34(a)(3)—under section6427(determined without regard to section6427(k)).

text: Credit shall not be allowed under subsection(a)for any amount payable under section6421or6427, if a claim for such amount is timely filed and, under section6421(i)or6427(k), is payable under such section.
conditions: a claim for such amount is timely filed and, under section6421(i)or6427(k), is payable under such section.

if: a claim for such amount is timely filed and, under section6421(i)or6427(k), is payable under such section.
logical_structure.result: Credit shall not be allowed under subsection(a)for any amount payable under section6421or6427,

cross_references.reason: nt is timely filed and, under...

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 34(b)Exception—Credit  shall not be allowed under subsection(a)for any amount payable under
                  section6421or6427, if a claim for such amount is timely filed and,  under  section6421(i)or6427(k), is payable under such section.
